Text: Osho was formerly known as Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh and his teachings led members of his cult to poison over 700 people in The Dalles, OR in 1984. He changed his name after he was deported from the U.S., but his teachings are the same - dangerous and insane.
Yes thank you, but also these teachings saved my life and made me understand the deference between humans and humanoids.

The fact that you believe that your fellow humans might be 'humanoids' is a bizarre one and shows the dangers of following the Bhagwan's 'teachings'.  De-humanizing those people around you enables you to easily mistreat them -- or even poison them, as the Bhagwan's followers did in 1984.

You sound to me like someone who needs psychiatric help, not the droning lectures of a obsessive and lunatic.
